page.title: 02Cowdenbeath Railway Station
page.content: Cowdenbeath railway station is a relatively small station. The only route is to Edinburgh through Dunfermline, Rosyth etc. Trains coming through Edinburgh usually stop at Cowdenbeath and change tracks for the return journey though through the week one goes on to Cardenden in the morning and at night while one goes there on Saturday. On Sunday there is no rail service from Cowdenbeath to Edinburgh. The first train from Cowdenbeath is at 07:07 and the last train is at 22:51. The busiest trains are the 10:07 and the 11:07. The journey from Cowdenbeath to Edinburgh takes about 40mins. There are about 30 people who purchase weekly tickets and about 20 who purchase monthly tickets from Cowdenbeath station.
